channel.title: Spectral's World - The Perfect Utopia
channel.description:
[center][size=50pt][font=comic sans ms]Spectral's World[/font][/size][/center]
-Project has been put on hold till next week due to me not having access to the computer that contains them.
[center]Spectral's World originated from a much less impressive and very inexperienced PI source that I developed back in early 2011, I later went on to develop it again later that year but dropped the project as I became increasingly bored with the source (Base being Project Insanity aswell) and never actually opened a development thread for it, so I like to think of this as Spectral's World 2.0 when in reality it should be 3.0. As for the Deob of this one, it's a 634 with a few 646 Implemented items.[/center]
[center]My honest and true intentions for this server are to create a lag free and fun Pking and Economic environment that has a stable economy and player base. Not only that but I'd like to implement custom quests into the game to keep a rather more unique feeling to the game that also keeps the players busy with meeting requirements for a weapon other then clicking on an npc waiting 10 seconds and then moving on to the next one gaining level after level, I also feel that by doing this and making certain weapons and armors gained only through quests instead of player trade it will keep the economy balanced on other things rather then being focused just on pking and keep items such as the abbysal whip's prices from crashing.[/center]
[Center]This is not a Runescape Remake of any revision in any way..[/center]
[size=10pt][u][b]Day-By-Day Update Diary[/b][/u][/size]
[ul][li][u][b]Friday, January 27, 2012[/b][/u][/li] [li]Re-added Duel Arena Staking[/li] [li]Changed home to Entrana, also moved shops around Entrana[/li] [li]You can now receive Chaotic item's through Castle Wars points and Dungeoneering[/li] [li]Changed the way regions load players for a less lag efficient method[/li] [li]Added several In-Game music tracks to regions - can be disabled via Settings Tab > Audio Settings[/li] [li]Critical hits are now fixed when you use special it will not appear as a critical hit unless it is[/li] [li]Frost Dragons now drop Frost Dragon bones instead of nulls[/li] [li]Chaos Elemental's animations are now the proper ones[/li] [li]Torva Constitution boost is now added and works properly[/li] [li]Fixed a glitch involving ring of stone[/li] [li]All foods in food shop are now edible and restore Constitution[/li] [li]Shops no longer run out of stock[/li] [li]You can now see the actual required price of the item in shops without clicking on it[/li] [li]Fairy Ring teleports changed - working on new codes[/li] [li]Dragon Claws bonuses are correct now[/li] [li]Removed several unneeded NPC's around lumbridge[/li] [li]Glitch when opening and closing doors now fixed (looped)[/li] [li]You can now open/close doors from inside of buildings[/li] [li]Teleports in Magic Book have been disabled until further notice[/li] [li]Fairy Rings/Teletabs/Jossik(NPC)/Chartering a ship/Glory (4)/Combat Brace/Ring of Dueling/Games Necklace are now only way to travel[/li] [li]Disabled all commands, ::help, ::rules, and ::info can now all be viewed by using the "Guide Book"[/li] [li]Staff no longer use crowns to be represented (copied BS's crown method) When hovering a mod/admin's name in chat box an information box with there staff position will appear, also there names are colored.[/li][/ul]
[u][b][size=10pt]Media[/size][/b][/u] [img]http://i.imgur.com/XYbqj.jpg[/img]
With media will come criticism, from the photos you obviously can't see what I've posted about so far but I more so wanted you to see the combat side of the server. (Why did you include photos of things you didn't even code?) Well, as you can see from the picture of Nex, I added Magic/Range/Melee attacks to him aswell as animations teleporting affects, "*cough* *cough*" forced text and his followers which attack you the whole time while standing completely in place.
[u][b]Ancient Curses picture[/b][/u]? Instead of simply typing in a command such as "::curses true/false" I'm developing a mini quest called Nomads Adventure (which I won't go into detail about now) and added an altar to which you must pray at to activate your curses. Without completing the quest you won't be able to pray at the altar or even reach the location of it.
[u][b]Korasi Picture[/b][/u]? In the source I downloaded the Korasi's special took away 60% or so of the special bar in which case I lowered it down to 55% and added the Ring of Vigour's effect so if you're skilled enough you'll easily be able to double special you filthy rushers. =)
[u][b]Bandos Picture[/b][/u]? Previously you could enter the Bandos Chamber without any Bandos kills or hammer to pound on the frozen door. I quickly added orks, goblins, ogres, and cyclops (along with all other npc's for other GWD bosses). You also now require a hammer to be used on the frozen door to enter the minions room.
[u][b]Dark Bow Picture[/b][/u]? Just thought it'd look bad ass.
[u][b]Obelisk Teleporting Picture[/b][/u]? You can barely see it but I'm standing in the middle of a wilderness obelisk in which case I've added now when you click it, it will randomly teleport you to any other obelisk inside of the wilderness (even above level 50) unfortunately I have to use the lunar teleport animation as I'm to lazy to find the right one at the moment.
[u][b]Corporeal Beast Picture[/b][/u]? Previously you'd be teleported into the actual room containing the Corporeal Beast where he'd begin to smack you while your loading. I've now changed it to where you teleport to the room outside of him and you can view his room by right clicking on the overpass and clicking "spectate". Not only that but I've added the Dark Core which will fly out directly in front of the corporeal beast (I've not yet added to where it fly towards you, but assuming your meleeing it'll fly towards you then) and it's also on a looped timer so it's not random yet either.
[b][u]Group Veng Picture[/u][/b]? I've added the Group Vengeance spell (haaaaaard coooooooooooded) it's icon to click is also located at the bottom of the Lunar's Spell book at the moment and will not light up when you have the required runes for it. It also gives you vengeance and anyone within 3 Squares away from you, the veng for you will turn red and the veng for others will be white and it will force the veng animation on you and send a forced text saying, "Group vengeance!" if you're the caster of the spell.
-I'd also like some opinions on turning this into a Development Team project? I feel with a bigger team other then just myself we'd truly be able to accomplish this task.

item.title: Spectral's World - The Perfect Utopia
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Good luck with this. I will for sure be checking this thread again.

Read full topic

item.title: Spectral's World - The Perfect Utopia
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:12, topic:430767”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=533443.msg3900161#msg3900161 date=1327696563]

  1. You jealous of my cool server name
  2. You can’t say perfect utopia, since that is what utopia represents
  3. Looks good
  1. I’ve always used “The Perfect Utopia” as my server’s slogan, and after I posted this I saw your server’s name but since you didn’t copyright it, it’s not your’s.
  2. I can say The Perfect Utopia because there are different Utopia’s such as mine and your’s and different ideas on what’s perfect and what Isn’t so generally speaking this is a Utopia that incorporates all other Utopia’s ideas thus making it, “The Perfect Utopia”.
  3. Thanks lol.
  1. Good
  2. You can’t since Utopia defines the perfect world of your dreams, in general, everyone has another view on that, but it does stay for everyone utopia, since utopia is imaginary and changes constantly mathering from who the person is that reads the word. Thats why it is Utopia
  3. gimme cookies
    [/quote]
  4. Thank you.
  5. But since it’s imaginary it changes to everyone’s ideal utopia and because it’s imaginary it’s not a product therefor it will never amount to anything other then that person’s own perspective of perfect, making it The Perfect Utopia.
  6. Peanuts or Chocolate Chip?[/quote]
    perspective of perfect, making it The Perfect Utopia.
    if (perfect) {
    utopia= true;
    }
    NOT
    if (utopia == perfect) {
    perfect = utopia;
    }

Why u no let me win D:

Read full topic

item.title: Spectral's World - The Perfect Utopia
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

[center][size=50pt][font=comic sans ms]Spectral’s World[/font][/size][/center]

-Project has been put on hold till next week due to me not having access to the computer that contains them.

[center]Spectral’s World originated from a much less impressive and very inexperienced PI source that I developed back in early 2011, I later went on to develop it again later that year but dropped the project as I became increasingly bored with the source (Base being Project Insanity aswell) and never actually opened a development thread for it, so I like to think of this as Spectral’s World 2.0 when in reality it should be 3.0. As for the Deob of this one, it’s a 634 with a few 646 Implemented items.[/center]

[center]My honest and true intentions for this server are to create a lag free and fun Pking and Economic environment that has a stable economy and player base. Not only that but I’d like to implement custom quests into the game to keep a rather more unique feeling to the game that also keeps the players busy with meeting requirements for a weapon other then clicking on an npc waiting 10 seconds and then moving on to the next one gaining level after level, I also feel that by doing this and making certain weapons and armors gained only through quests instead of player trade it will keep the economy balanced on other things rather then being focused just on pking and keep items such as the abbysal whip’s prices from crashing.[/center]

[Center]This is not a Runescape Remake of any revision in any way…[/center]

[size=10pt]Day-By-Day Update Diary[/size]

[ul][li]Friday, January 27, 2012[/li]
[li]Re-added Duel Arena Staking[/li]
[li]Changed home to Entrana, also moved shops around Entrana[/li]
[li]You can now receive Chaotic item’s through Castle Wars points and Dungeoneering[/li]
[li]Changed the way regions load players for a less lag efficient method[/li]
[li]Added several In-Game music tracks to regions - can be disabled via Settings Tab > Audio Settings[/li]
[li]Critical hits are now fixed when you use special it will not appear as a critical hit unless it is[/li]
[li]Frost Dragons now drop Frost Dragon bones instead of nulls[/li]
[li]Chaos Elemental’s animations are now the proper ones[/li]
[li]Torva Constitution boost is now added and works properly[/li]
[li]Fixed a glitch involving ring of stone[/li]
[li]All foods in food shop are now edible and restore Constitution[/li]
[li]Shops no longer run out of stock[/li]
[li]You can now see the actual required price of the item in shops without clicking on it[/li]
[li]Fairy Ring teleports changed - working on new codes[/li]
[li]Dragon Claws bonuses are correct now[/li]
[li]Removed several unneeded NPC’s around lumbridge[/li]
[li]Glitch when opening and closing doors now fixed (looped)[/li]
[li]You can now open/close doors from inside of buildings[/li]
[li]Teleports in Magic Book have been disabled until further notice[/li]
[li]Fairy Rings/Teletabs/Jossik(NPC)/Chartering a ship/Glory (4)/Combat Brace/Ring of Dueling/Games Necklace are now only way to travel[/li]
[li]Disabled all commands, ::help, ::rules, and ::info can now all be viewed by using the “Guide Book”[/li]
[li]Staff no longer use crowns to be represented (copied BS’s crown method) When hovering a mod/admin’s name in chat box an information box with there staff position will appear, also there names are colored.[/li][/ul]

[size=10pt]Media[/size]

XYbqj.jpg845×751

With media will come criticism, from the photos you obviously can’t see what I’ve posted about so far but I more so wanted you to see the combat side of the server. (Why did you include photos of things you didn’t even code?) Well, as you can see from the picture of Nex, I added Magic/Range/Melee attacks to him aswell as animations teleporting affects, “cough cough” forced text and his followers which attack you the whole time while standing completely in place.

Ancient Curses picture? Instead of simply typing in a command such as “::curses true/false” I’m developing a mini quest called Nomads Adventure (which I won’t go into detail about now) and added an altar to which you must pray at to activate your curses. Without completing the quest you won’t be able to pray at the altar or even reach the location of it.

Korasi Picture? In the source I downloaded the Korasi’s special took away 60% or so of the special bar in which case I lowered it down to 55% and added the Ring of Vigour’s effect so if you’re skilled enough you’ll easily be able to double special you filthy rushers. =)

Bandos Picture? Previously you could enter the Bandos Chamber without any Bandos kills or hammer to pound on the frozen door. I quickly added orks, goblins, ogres, and cyclops (along with all other npc’s for other GWD bosses). You also now require a hammer to be used on the frozen door to enter the minions room.

Dark Bow Picture? Just thought it’d look bad ass.

Obelisk Teleporting Picture? You can barely see it but I’m standing in the middle of a wilderness obelisk in which case I’ve added now when you click it, it will randomly teleport you to any other obelisk inside of the wilderness (even above level 50) unfortunately I have to use the lunar teleport animation as I’m to lazy to find the right one at the moment.

Corporeal Beast Picture? Previously you’d be teleported into the actual room containing the Corporeal Beast where he’d begin to smack you while your loading. I’ve now changed it to where you teleport to the room outside of him and you can view his room by right clicking on the overpass and clicking “spectate”. Not only that but I’ve added the Dark Core which will fly out directly in front of the corporeal beast (I’ve not yet added to where it fly towards you, but assuming your meleeing it’ll fly towards you then) and it’s also on a looped timer so it’s not random yet either.

Group Veng Picture? I’ve added the Group Vengeance spell (haaaaaard coooooooooooded) it’s icon to click is also located at the bottom of the Lunar’s Spell book at the moment and will not light up when you have the required runes for it.
It also gives you vengeance and anyone within 3 Squares away from you, the veng for you will turn red and the veng for others will be white and it will force the veng animation on you and send a forced text saying, “Group vengeance!” if you’re the caster of the spell.

-I’d also like some opinions on turning this into a Development Team project? I feel with a bigger team other then just myself we’d truly be able to accomplish this task.

Read full topic
